div.p: Melanie Diener (soprano - No. 2), Barbara Bonney (soprano - No. 4), Petra Lang (mezzo - Nos. 2 & 3), Jane Eaglen, Anne Schwanewilms, Ruth Ziesak (sopranos - No. 8), Sara Fulgoni, Anna Larsson (contraltos - No. 8), Ben Heppner (No. 8), Peter Mattei (baritone - No. 8), Jan-Hendrik Rootering (bass - No. 8)
Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra & Radio Symphonie Orchester, Berlin (Symphony No. 10), Riccardo Chailly

blockquote.span: Chailly's strong, satisfying approach to Mahler, without eccentricity, is supported by the superb playing of the Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra throughout and the demonstration quality of the Decca sound, never more remarkable than in the dedicated account of the Resurrection Symphony.

li.a: Mahler: Symphony No. 1 in D major 'Titan'
Mahler: Symphony No. 6 in A minor 'Tragic'
Mahler: Symphony No. 8 in E flat major 'Symphony of a Thousand'
Mahler: Symphony No. 10 in F sharp major
